name: Adventurers of Otium
description: Adventuring is dangerous. Hire someone else to do it for you!
author: James Hurburgh

versions.description: Removal of inline code and formatting.
features: Improved formatting of notices.
Added global exception handler.
Get coin or renown animation.  That's all.
Session tracking enabled for other functionality.
Improved finished quest tab as well as other minor enhancements to other tabs.
Filled contracts based on if you haven't logged in for a while.
MAJOR UPDATE - Please reset you game.
Adventurers are now individual instead of just being numbers.
Adventures now have a base cost and don't cost more.
Adventurers have skills.
Adventurers will gain XP for mission.  It can't be used yet, but it's there.
Major interface updates to make everything more readable/obvious.
Contract requirements are now based on skills instead of party members.
Contracts can be rejected
Adventurers and contracts hang about for longer but don't show up as often.
Time has more description and a coloured background based on time.
Holidays will now show up below the calendar.
Tabs are now hidden when there are no items.
An in-progress data manager can be accessed from the menu and provides details on some of the data files used.
Option: Show achievement time as real time or game time.
bugfixes: Statistics filter is not trim sensitive

features: Added game time to the bottom of the view.
Messages now log in game time.
Indicators on each tab that there are not items.
bugfixes: Fixed bug where leftover contracts giving reknown couldn't be claimed.
Typo causing contracts to never expire.
Fixed bug where you stopped getting rewards
Fixed not losing an item when you use or sell it.
Fixed bug where you stopped getting rewards.

features: Improved mysterious scroll effects
Added global effects
Updated some items and contracts
Adventurers now have a chance of showing up in other locations
Improved artwork and weapons
Improved item reward generation

bugfixes: Fixed bug where all loot was mysterious scrolls

features: Items are now obtainable through missions
Items can be sold for their value
Some items can be used
Added messages interface
Tabs!  Everything is in tabs now.
bugfixes: Statistic filter is now case insensitive
Initial load now sets game version

features: Split up automation options and displayed better in dialog.
Added new version notification.
Reworked achievements and added some.
Removed recalculating stuff all the time.
Statistic table can now be filtered in modal view.
Only show hired adventurers.
Adventurer totals shown
Merged coins and renown in bottom bar so preserve space
bugfixes: Fixed layout bug to stopped relocate buttons from being accessible.
Fixed top and bottom of content being cut off

features: Added more adventurers for the tavern.
Added more contracts for the tavern.
Updated hired adventurers to a table for readability.
Achievement message is more interesting.
Added achievement viewing.
Added footer and moved coins and renown there.
Added statistic tracking and viewing.

versions.description: The UI update.  Put everything in places that hopefully make a little more sense.
features: UI updated with a proper nav bar and everything.
Hire all and start all contracts.
Simple options dialog
Automation tools for testing
Major layout adjustments to make the game more mobile friendly.
Added oversized quest stat indicators.
Added coin counter just above adventurers for hire.
Added reward factors to contracts
Added some new contracts
Improved updating to new version
Contracts now show risk, reward and duration factors

versions.description: Upgrades to expeditions to show more details.
features: Show all adventurers and statuses on completed quest cards
Running expeditions colour coding
Progress bar on running expeditions

versions.description: Initial versioned release!  Versioning and save game loading improved.
features: Added release notes and versioning.
bugfixes: Rejigged saved game loading.  Should work better now.
